Class Sequence

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Sequence

  • public class Sequence
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      Sequence(int toChase1, int toScatter1, int toChase2, int toScatter2, int toChase3, int toScatter3, int toChaseForEver)
      Creates a sequence with different chases and scatters.

      Allows to obtain the chase timer task for the game.

      • Sequence

        public Sequence(int toChase1,
                int toScatter1,
                int toChase2,
                int toScatter2,
                int toChase3,
                int toScatter3,
                int toChaseForEver)
        Creates a sequence with different chases and scatters.
        Parameters:
        toChase1 - is an integer that represents the number of times of the first chase.
        toScatter1 - is an integer that represents the number of times of the first scatter.
        toChase2 - is an integer that represents the number of times of the second chase.
        toScatter2 - is an integer that represents the number of times of the second scatter.
        toChase3 - is an integer that represents the number of times of the third chase.
        toScatter3 - is an integer that represents the number of times of the third scatter.
        toChaseForEver - is an integer that represents the number of times of the next chases.
